name: Lite-On Technology
overview:
Lite-On Technology Corporation manufactures imaging products, enclosures, power supplies, and LEDs in Taiwan and internationally. Its optoelectronic product line includes white LEDs, SMD LED lamps, LED displays, photo couplers, and infrared components. The company also produces power supply products, including notebook computer adapters, power converters, adapters for networking devices, and other energy efficient products. In addition, it offers phone camera modules, modem and wireless technologies, DT casings, LCD displays, portable multimedia devices, key components for inkjet and laser printers, wired PC keyboards, multimedia wired PC keyboards, multi-functional gaming keyboards, wired optical/laser mice, wireless keyboard/mouse kits, wireless remote controls and presenters, and network switches. Further, the company provides DVD recorders and players, mobile phone accessories, diode rectifiers, power supplies and transformers, and inverters for various applications. Additionally, it offers design and manufacturing services for electronic manufactures, including personal digital assistant and portable navigation device product manufacturers.

The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
